name: シェイム・オン・ミー
content: Shame on me for loving you
Can't deny that you been untrue
你虚伪不已 这点不可否认
Lie so sweet but you love to tease
花言巧语 蛊惑人心
Put that fire out with gasoline
一开始你就那么丧心病狂
Shame on you for loving me
That's what I get for loving you
爱上你我就得到这样的结局
So  I get my kicks without you
所以失去你简直是我的致命一击
That's what I get for loving you
爱上你我得到的就是这些
I could not live without you
That's what I get for loving you
爱上你我就得到这样的结局
I could not live without you
Shame on me for loving you
Putting out fire with your gasoline
I'mma raise hell to the bitter end
我会让你的生活更痛苦
Shame on you for loving me
爱上我你真的太羞耻了
Ha  Yay  yeah yeah  Uh  uh  uh
That's what I get for loving you
爱上你我就得到这样的结局
So  I get my kicks without you
所以失去你简直是我的致命一击
我本可以潇洒点离你而去的
It'll end with you  with you
我们之间只会走向结束
That's what I get for loving you
爱上你我就得到这样的结局
